mapper.select: SELECT C.CODE_SEQ AS codeSeq , C.PARENTS_CODE_SEQ AS parentsCodeSeq , C.CODE AS code , C.CODE_NM AS codeNm , C.CODE_DC AS codeDc , C.USE_AT AS useAt , C.SORT_ORDR AS sortOrdr FROM COMMON_CODE C WHERE 1 = 1 AND PARENTS_CODE_SEQ = 0 ORDER BY SORT_ORDR

SELECT C.CODE_SEQ AS codeSeq , C.PARENTS_CODE_SEQ AS parentsCodeSeq , C.CODE AS code , C.CODE_NM AS codeNm , C.CODE_DC AS codeDc , C.USE_AT AS useAt , C.SORT_ORDR AS sortOrdr , fnc.depth AS depth FROM ( SELECT getCommonCodeLevel() AS seq, @level AS depth FROM ( SELECT @start_with:=0, @seq:=@start_with, @level:=0 ) vars JOIN COMMON_CODE WHERE @seq IS NOT NULL ) fnc JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON fnc.seq = C.PARENTS_CODE_SEQ ORDER BY depth, SORT_ORDR

SELECT C.CODE_SEQ AS codeSeq , C.PARENTS_CODE_SEQ AS parentsCodeSeq , C.CODE AS code , C.CODE_NM AS codeNm , C.CODE_DC AS codeDc , C.USE_AT AS useAt , C.SORT_ORDR AS sortOrdr FROM COMMON_CODE C WHERE 1 = 1 AND CODE_SEQ = #{codeSeq}

SELECT C.CODE_SEQ AS codeSeq , C.PARENTS_CODE_SEQ AS parentsCodeSeq , C.CODE AS code , C.CODE_NM AS codeNm , C.CODE_DC AS codeDc , C.USE_AT AS useAt , C.SORT_ORDR AS sortOrdr FROM COMMON_CODE C WHERE 1 = 1 AND PARENTS_CODE_SEQ = #{codeSeq} ORDER BY SORT_ORDR

SELECT C.CODE_SEQ AS codeSeq , C.SORT_ORDR AS sortOrdr FROM COMMON_CODE C WHERE C.CODE_SEQ <> #{codeSeq} AND C.USE_AT = 'Y' AND C.SORT_ORDR > #{sortOrdr} ORDER BY SORT_ORDR ASC, CREATE_DT DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT C.CODE_SEQ AS codeSeq , C.SORT_ORDR AS sortOrdr FROM COMMON_CODE C WHERE C.CODE_SEQ <> #{codeSeq} AND C.USE_AT = 'Y' AND C.SORT_ORDR < #{sortOrdr} ORDER BY SORT_ORDR DESC, CREATE_DT DESC LIMIT 1
